text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The model explicitly addresses the 'operating and substantial cause' test under the Legal Causation section. It states: 'The truck driver's act need not be the sole or main cause, but must be: More than minimal or negligible; An operating and substantial cause' and cites R v Hennigan [1971] to support this.
